segments.text: Yes , do I have to work a whole year before I can take a vacation ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , after you ’ Ve been here a year , you qualify for a three-day vacation
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What happens if I use up my sick days before the end of the year ? If I ’ m sick an extra day or two , will my pay be deducted ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It was the same as the last place I worked at . I was hoping you ’ d be different .
segments.speaker: S2
